00097 #ifndef DF_CROSS_ENTROPY_INDEPENDENT_H
00098 #define DF_CROSS_ENTROPY_INDEPENDENT_H
00099 
00100 #include <cmath>
00101 #include "ReClaM/ModelInterface.h"
00102 
00103 //===========================================================================
00150 class DF_CrossEntropyIndependent : virtual public ModelInterface {
00151     // This value is used instead of log of a small number to avoid numerical instabilities. 
00152   // This value is chosen, as minLog = log(0) on a unix system.
00153   const static double minLog=-730;
00154   const static double maxDeriv=1e300;
00155  public:
00156 
00157 //===========================================================================
00186   double error(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target) {
00187     double ce=0;
00188     if (outputDimension>1)
00189       // more then one output neuron
00190       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00191         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00192         model(in, output);
00193         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++)
00194           if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00195             ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) + ( 1. - target(c) ) * log( 1. - output(c) );
00196           else if(output(c)!=target(c))
00197             ce -= minLog;
00198       } else {
00199         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00200         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00201           model(in[pattern], output);
00202           //      writeArray(output,std::cout);
00203           for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++)
00204             if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00205                 ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) ) + (1. - target(pattern, c)) * log( 1. - output(c) );
00206             else if(output(c)!=target(pattern, c))
00207                 ce -= minLog;   
00208         }
00209       }
00210     else{
00211       // only one output neuron
00212       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00213         // one pattern
00214         Array<double> output(1);
00215         model(in, output);
00216         if ((output(0)!=0) && (1.0-output(0)!=0))
00217           ce -= (target(0)*log(output(0))+(1.0-target(0))*log(1.0-output(0)));
00218         else if (output(0)!=target(0))
00219           ce -= minLog;
00220       } else {
00221         // more then one pattern
00222         Array<double> output(1);
00223         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00224           model(in[pattern], output);
00225           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1.0-output(0)!=0))
00226             ce -= target(pattern,0)*log(output(0))+(1.0-target(pattern,0))*log(1.0-output(0));
00227           else if (output(0)!=target(pattern,0))
00228             ce -= minLog;         
00229         }
00230       }
00231     }
00232     return ce;
00233   }
00234   
00235 //===========================================================================
00277   double derror(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target, bool returnError=true) {
00278     dedw = 0;
00279     double ce = 0;
00280     coeffs.resize(outputDimension, false);
00281     coeffs = 0;
00282     if (outputDimension>1)
00283       // more then one output neuron
00284       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00285         // one input pattern
00286         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00287         model(in, output);
00288         if (returnError){
00289           // calculate CrossEntropyIndependent
00290           for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++)
00291             if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00292               ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) + ( 1. - target(c) ) * log( 1. - output(c) );
00293             else if(output(c)!=target(c))
00294               ce -= minLog;
00295         }
00296         // calculate derivative dedw
00297           for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++)
00298             if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00299               coeffs(c) = (  (target(c) - output(c))/( (1. - output(c)) * output(c) )  );
00300             else if(output(c)!=target(c)) 
00301               coeffs(c) = ( 2.0*target(c)-1.0 ) * maxDeriv;
00302           df(coeffs, dedw);
00303       } else {
00304         // more than one input pattern
00305         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00306         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00307           model(in[pattern], output);
00308           if (returnError){
00309             // calculate cross-entropy
00310             for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++)
00311               if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00312                 ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) ) + (1. - target(pattern, c)) * log( 1. - output(c) );
00313               else if(output(c)!=target(pattern, c))
00314                 ce -= minLog;   
00315           }
00316           // calculate dericative dedw
00317           for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++)
00318             if((output(c)!=0) && (1.0-output(c)!=0))
00319               coeffs(c) =  (  (target(pattern,c) - output(c))/( (1. - output(c)) * output(c) )  );
00320             else if(output(c)!=target(pattern, c))
00321               // the sign changes due to the value of the target, maxDeriv is devided by reason of computational bounds
00322               coeffs(c) = ( 2.0*target(pattern,c)-1.0 ) * maxDeriv/in.dim(0);
00323           df(coeffs,dedw); 
00324         }
00325       }
00326     else {
00327       // one output neuron
00328       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00329         // only one pattern
00330         Array<double> output(1);
00331         model(in, output);
00332         if (returnError){
00333           // calculate ce
00334           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00335             ce -= (target(0) * log(output(0)) + (1. -target(0)) * log(1. - output(0)));
00336           else if (output(0) != target(0)) 
00337             ce -= minLog;
00338         }
00339         // calculate derivative dedw
00340         if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0) != 0)){
00341           coeffs(0) = (target(0) - output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0)));
00342           df(coeffs, dedw);
00343         } else { 
00344           if (output(0) != target(0)){
00345             // the sign changes due to the value of the target,
00346             coeffs(0) = (2. * target(0) - 1.) * maxDeriv;
00347             df(coeffs, dedw);
00348           }
00349         }
00350       } else {
00351         // a number of patterns
00352         Array<double> output(1);
00353         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00354           model(in[pattern], output);//
00355           if (returnError){
00356             // calculate ce
00357             if ((output(0) != 0) && (1. - output(0) != 0))
00358               ce -= target(pattern, 0) * log(output(0)) + (1. - target(pattern, 0)) * log(1. - output(0));
00359             else  if (output(0)!=target(pattern,0))
00360               ce -= minLog;
00361           }
00362           // calculate derivative dedw
00363           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0)){
00364             coeffs(0)=(target(pattern, 0)-output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0)));
00365             df(coeffs, dedw);
00366           } else { 
00367             if (output(0) != target(pattern, 0)){
00368               // the sign changes due to the value of the target, maxDeriv is devided by reason of computational bounds
00369               coeffs(0)=(2. * target(pattern, 0) - 1.) * maxDeriv / in.dim(0);
00370               df(coeffs, dedw);
00371             }
00372           }
00373         }
00374       }
00375     }
00376     if (!returnError)
00377       ce = -1;
00378     return ce;
00379   }
00380   
00381   private:
00382 
00383   Array<double> coeffs;  
00384 };
00385 #endif
